data.text: @ThomasT162 Hi Thomas, sorry to hear about your cancelled flights. We know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jaya
@nesnamkoi Hi Nesnam, I appreciate your frustration with this. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to your destination. Thanks- Jen

@joereidy__ Hi Joe, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a DM and we'd be happy to assist you. Thanks - Jeff

@jadyata If you think you might need a little more next time you travel, you can purchase an extra 7kgs online before you fly. If you like to discuss a specific booking further, please send us a DM so we can assist. - Paul 2/2

data.text: @jadyata @jadyata Hi there, sorry to hear about your recent experience. It may help to know that we limit carry on to 7kgs in total for each passenger – including things like handbags and laptop bags. 1/2
@GilliantheGP Sure @GilliantheGP! Feel free to send us a DM here to speak with an agent. Thanks- Jen

@GilliantheGP Hi @GilliantheGP, thanks for reaching out. We’re so glad one of our staff was on-hand to help make your experience with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make their day!😊️) - Jen

@TGullaci Hi Tony, I'm sorry to hear what happened. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you need further assistance with your booking, please DM us with your booking details so we can assist. - Paul

@JulianFGC Hi Julian, I'm sorry to hear this. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. If you'd like to discuss a specific booking further, please DM us and we'd be happy to assist. Thanks - Paul
@ChrisTagle Hi Chris, that’s the kind of feedback we love to hear – and we’re sure they will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Paul
@GyrotexYT Hi Gyro, sorry to hear this. We have escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams. Thanks – Leslie
@bivabytes Hi Anna, I can appreciate how important this is for you. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can help you sort out your booking? Thanks- Jen
@SJACS1 Hi Skye, I'm sorry to hear this. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully you’ll be on your way soon. – Jay
@corporatelawAU Hi Jason, glad to hear you had a smooth and efficient check-in today. Thanks for letting us know. We really appreciate it!😊 - Leslie
@DrDeCaluwe Hi Steven, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Leslie

@MeredithBooth Hi Meredith, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change especially if holidays are delayed. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi
@_noodles78 Hi @_noodles78, sorry to hear this. I suggest for you advise the passenger to speak with our team at the airport for assistance. Thanks - Jeff

@gusk Hi @gusk, we never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, feel free to send us a DM. Thanks- Jen

@NzChrissie Hi Missy, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a PM and quote INV585 to speak with an agent. Thanks - Jeff

@sklily1 @sklily1 Hi there, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be so we never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM so we can assist. - Paul

@adamwalker01011 Hi @adamwalker01011, overbooking can happen on commercial flights from time to time. If you require any assistance with your booking, you can send us a DM so we can look into this and see what we can do to help. Thanks - Vi

@OliviaSPM Hi Olivia, I understand how upsetting it can be to have your flight cancelled at a short notice. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi
@Stua76 Hi there! You'll always be provided with option if your flight gets disrupted. If you need to discuss a specific booking, feel free to send us a DM. Thanks - Mauri

@joolzfashion Hi Joolz, Sorry to hear you were having trouble reaching us. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this and see how we can help. Thanks - Mauri

data.text: @Plasmodium26 Hi Kerry, thanks for reaching out. Knitting needles may be permitted on board your domestic flight. You can check this link for more info - https://t.co/mD7LeihjTR. Thanks - Vi
@B_BanaszakMD Hi Belinda, sorry to hear this. Could you please send us a DM with more info? We’d love the chance to chat with you about this so we can assist. Thanks - Paul
@netski14 Hi Janetta. I'm sorry to hear you are unable to check-in online. I'll pass this feedback to the team. Alternatively, you may check in at the airport. Thanks – Mauri

data.text: @incognicko_mode We're careful to outline this on our Travel Alerts Page. For more info, you can check it here -- https://t.co/mi8VNUuS7M Thanks - Norine 2/2

@incognicko_mode Hi Nick, I'm sorry to hear you weren't aware of the requirements needed before flying. We always advise our passengers to always check the requirements needed before booking flights. 1/2

@DKaitT We do our best to seat families together and our check-in staff are always on hand to make sure that young children are seated with a parent or guardian on the day of travel. If you need assistance with your booking now, feel free to send us a DM here. Thanks - Norine 2/2
@DKaitT Hi DK, I understand why this must be frustrating for you. Don't worry, final seating arrangements are done by our staff at the airport. 1/2
@r1chaur Hi Richard, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. if you need to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a DM and we'd be happy to assist you. Thanks - Jeff
@theluqmanarian 1/2 If you think you might need a little more next time you travel, you can purchase an extra 7kgs online before you fly. Thanks – Jen

data.text: @theluqmanarian 1/1 Hi @theluqmanarian, I appreciate how upsetting it is to pay an extra fee. We limit carry-on to 7kgs in total for each passenger including things like handbags and laptop bags – so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee.

data.text: @dinghy511 Hi @dinghy511, sorry to hear that your voucher has expired. We've extended credit vouchers issued as a result of COVID-19 disruptions to have an expiry month of December 2022. You can visit - https://t.co/pJEJWfuSYq or feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @MarceloAlvarez Hi Marcelo, I understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and can be reached here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Jeff
@sellheimsays That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Annelies – and we’re sure Karol will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Jaya

@M3lleWood Hi @M3lleWood, I'm sorry to hear you have trouble contacting our team over call and chat. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see how we can help. Could you DM us more details so we can look into things? Thanks- Jen

@l_harman Hi Loz, baggage allowance is given by combined weight, not by the number of bags. As long as your bags have a combined weight within your allowance, you can bring as many as you like. Hope this helps. Thanks - Norine

@RAturaliya Hi Rumal, I appreciate waiting can be hard and I totally understand why this must be upsetting for you. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@born_a_pom Hi Steve, we’re usually proud of the experience our team provides. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to help. Thanks - Mauri
@mattknell Hi Matt, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info so we look into this? Thanks – Mauri
@cpat13 Hi Clare, thanks for your feedback. I'll pass this to the team for you. - Paul
@McJclm Hi @McJclm, sorry to hear that you're unable to reach us. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks - Jaya
@theartfu1doctor 2/2  If you require assistance with your booking now, we’d be happy to help – feel free to send us a DM so we can assist further. Thanks – Jaya

data.text: @theartfu1doctor 1/2 Hi James, I appreciate how upsetting this must be for you. Our booking systems are designed to seat people travelling together in the same row – but if other customers have pre-booked seat allocations, there are times when only separate seats are available.

data.text: @Curableonlybyd1 Hi @Curableonlybyd1, sorry to hear that your daughters bag is missing. Our baggage team are best placed to assist with this. For more info and to speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVvuHx. Thanks - Jeff
@nuguns17 That’s not the standard we set for our aircraft, Mr Mee – thanks for letting us know. We’ve passed this onto our cleaners. – Mauri

@IOKEYYOUOK Hi @IOKEYYOUOK, sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. Thanks - Jeff

@BelPringle Hi @BelPringle, overbooking can happen on commercial flights from time to time. If you wish to know more or you'd like to discuss a specific booking, you can send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi
@mytidalheart Hi there, I understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Mauri

@Pussanur Hi Puspita, thanks for getting back. I'm sorry to hear about your difficulties checking-in online. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@KirstenPoChing Hi Kirsten, I'm sorry to hear that your flight is cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy
@HollySophiaa Hi Holly, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

data.text: @mariellam Hi Mariella, we're sorry for the inconvenience caused. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and can be reached here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Mauri

@katedin Hi Kate, I know having a cancelled flight is never a good feeling. I'm really sorry for any inconvenience this has caused you. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need further assistance. We'd be happy to check what we can do. Thanks - Norine
@EGotschi Hi Elisabeth, I appreciate how upsetting this must be for you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info so we can look into things for you? Thanks – Mauri

@joolzfashion Hi Joolz, I understand that you'd like to check the status of the JQ44 flight. Would you like sending us a DM with your booking info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Mauri
@fleetwoodtrash Hi @fleetwoodtrash, this definitely sounds like something we need to look into properly. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? Thanks- Jen

@Mark_313313 Hi Mark, sorry to hear about your delayed flight - we do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. If you require assistance with your booking, please sent us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks – Mauri

@EricEllingworth Hi Eric, I understand how upsetting it can be when you don't have your checked baggage and are unable to reach us. Would you mind sending us a DM with some more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Vi

@Kayla_Nemaia Hi Kayla, sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled and recent experience. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Jeff

@ProfRetail Hi there, sorry for the inconvenience this has caused you - we do our best to avoid delays but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance with your booking, please sent us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks – Mauri

@brad_mear Hi Brad, sorry to hear your flight was cancelled - we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. Thanks – Mauri
@1MARKJX Hi Mark, sorry to hear about your delayed flight. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Kimmy
@raspberrymerlot Hi Kylie, I appreciate how confusing this is. Would you mind sending us a DM please - we may be able to provide more details about your flight. Thanks- Jen

@mohit627 @mohit627 Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Our website is functioning normally at the moment and I'm seeing Club Jetstar fares. If there aren’t any Club Jetstar fares on the dates you are searching, you could check for a different route or date and try again. - Paul
@puffin89 We’re so glad our staff was on-hand to help make your experience with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make their day!) – Jaya
@WirhTs Hi @WirhTs, sorry to hear about your recent experience. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Vi

@Pussanur Hi Puspita, sorry to hear about your delayed flight. We do our best to avoid this – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks - Jaya
@FastAshFurious @FastAshFurious Hi there, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this for you. Thanks – Paul

@GarwinT Hi Garwin, sorry to hear about the cancellations. We know how inconvenient it can be so we try to avoid them as much as possible. Feel free to send us a DM if you require assistance with rebooking or would like to explore alternative options. Thanks – Paul

@mariellam Hi Mariella, sorry to hear about the delays. We do our best to avoid this – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon with your baggage. Thanks - Paul
@Anny97151625 If you require assistance with your booking, you may send us a DM so we can assist. Thanks - Paul 2/2

At the moment our systems are designed to seat passengers travelling together – but there are times when only separate seats are available. 1/2

data.text: @kateeekins Hi Kate, thanks for reaching out. Baggage allowance can be shared across your travelling party provided they are on the same booking reference and check in for the flight together. Please note that no single bag or item can weigh more than 32kg. 1/2
@JoelEade Hi Joel, thanks for reaching out. Pooling or sharing of baggage allowance will be allowed if your travel partner is in the same booking and if you're checking in together. Thanks - Vi

@RogLaws Hi @RogLaws, sorry to hear about what happened and I appreciate you taking the time to provide me with your feedback. Please be assured that I will be passing your feedback to the team. If you need further assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy

@airly_cofo Hi Luke, sorry to hear about what happened. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM with your booking details. Thanks – Paul

@SatyarthMish @SatyarthMish Hi there, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient it can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM. Thanks – Paul
@Jeaksy1 That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, Jake. Thanks for letting us know so we can look into what happened here. - Vi

@metherall Hi Lucas, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy
@sallykenney Hi Sally, sorry to hear your difficulties with checking-in online. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@UsrvNair Hi @UsrvNair, great idea! Our team is always open to new ideas and we evaluate our schedules all the time. We'll be sure to pass your feedback on and recommend you keep an eye on our website for updates here - https://t.co/nVkYpNIZfZ. Thanks - Vi

@ReidParker_ Hi Reid, we do our best to seat families together and our check-in staff are always on hand at the airport to make sure that young children are seated with a parent or guardian on the day of travel. If you require assistance with your booking, feel free to send us a DM. -  Leslie
@CatGtze Hi @CatGtze, I understand how upsetting the situation can be for you. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can further look into this? Thanks - Vi

@verydi5co Hi @verydi5co, thanks for reaching out. We don’t currently have direct flights from Perth to Kuala Lumpur, however, we’re always evaluating our schedules so I’d recommend you keep an eye on our website - https://t.co/nVkYpNIZfZ. Any updates will be posted there! - Vi
@connarty Hi Laura, sorry to hear about your recent experience. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

@Paddybo00589744 Hi @Paddybo00589744, sorry for any inconvenience this has caused. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy
@mdonch1 Hi Michael, this doesn’t sound like the experience that we want for our customers. Are you able to send us a DM with more info? We would like to look into this further – Leslie
@ralphd2 Hi @ralphd2, I understand how inconvenient this is for you. Could you please send us a DM with some more info so we can look into this further and see what we can do. Thanks – Jen
